name: FL_NON_NOM
description: Presence of other than nominal soil

name: FL_SCENE_T
description: True (1) if any of scene flags is set (1)

name: FL_BARREN
description: Scene flag indicating presence of rocks

name: FL_TOPO_S
description: Scene flag indicating presence of strong topography

name: FL_TOPO_M
description: Scene flag indicating presence of moderate topography

name: FL_OW
description: Scene flag indicating presence of open water

name: FL_SNOW_MIX
description: Scene flag indicating presence of mixed snow

name: FL_SNOW_WET
description: Scene flag indicating presence of wet snow

name: FL_SNOW_DRY
description: Scene flag indicating presence of significant dry snow

name: FL_FOREST
description: Scene flag indicating presence of forest

name: FL_NOMINAL
description: Scene flag indicating presence of nominal soil

name: FL_FROST
description: Scene flag indicating presence of frost

name: FL_ICE
description: Scene flag indicating presence of permanent ice/snow

name: FL_WETLANDS
description: Scene flag indicating presence of wetlands

name: FL_FLOOD_PROB
description: Scene flag indicating probable flooding risk

name: FL_URBAN_LOW
description: Scene flag indicating presence of limited urban area

name: FL_URBAN_HIGH
description: Scene flag indicating presence of large urban area

name: FL_SAND
description: Scene flag indicating presence of high sand fraction

name: FL_SEA_ICE
description: Scene flag indicating presence of sea ice

name: FL_COAST
description: Scene flag indicating presence of large tidal flag

name: FL_OCCUR_T
description: True (1) if any of occur flags is set (1)

name: FL_LITTER
description: Occur flag indicating litter suspected

name: FL_PR
description: Occur flag indicating interception suspected (polarisation ratio)

name: FL_INTERCEP
description: Occur flag - ECMWF indicates interception)

name: FL_EXTERNAL
description: Any of the external flags on, or N_SKY counter not equal to zero

name: FL_RAIN
description: External flag indicating heavy rain suspected

name: FL_TEC
description: External flag indicating high ionospheric contributions

name: FL_TAU_FO
description: Scene flag indicating presence of thick forest

name: FL_WINTER_FOREST
description: Flag indicating that the winter forest case has been selected by the decision tree

name: FL_DUAL_RETR_FNO_FFO
description: Flag indicating dual retrieval is performed on the FNO and FFO fractions
